name: Acid Splash
description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage. This spell’s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

name: Booming Blade

components.materials_needed: A melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

description: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell’s range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects, and it becomes sheathed in booming energy until the start of your next turn. If the target willingly moves before then, it immediately takes 1d8 thunder damage, and the spell ends. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 thunder damage on hit, and the damage the target takes for moving increases to 2d8. Both damage rolls increase at 11th level and 17th level.

name: Chill Touch
description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to assail it with the chill of the grave. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage, and it can’t regain hit points until the start of your next turn. Until then, the hand clings to the target. If you hit an undead target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn. The spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

name: Control Flames
description: You choose nonmagical flame that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube. You affect it in one of several ways: You can expand or extinguish the flames, double or halve their area, or cause them to move up to 5 feet in a direction. You can also cause simple shapes or forms to appear in the flames and change their color. These changes last for 1 hour.

name: Create Bonfire
description: You create a bonfire on ground that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the magic bonfire fills a 5-foot cube. Any creature in the bonfire’s space when you cast the spell must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 fire damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when it moves into the bonfire’s space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The bonfire ignites flammable objects in its area that aren’t being worn or carried. The spell’s damage increases by 1d8 at 5th (2d8), 11th (3d8), and 17th (4d8) level.

name: Dancing Lights
description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration. You can also combine the four lights into one glowing vaguely humanoid form. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius. As a bonus action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet.

name: Druidcraft
description: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects: create a tiny harmless sensory effect predicting weather, instantly cause a flower to bloom, create a harmless sensory effect like falling leaves, or subtly alter a natural sensory effect in the area.

name: Eldritch Blast
description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage. The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th, and four beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones.

name: Fire Bolt
description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn’t being worn or carried. The spell’s damage increases by 1d10 when you reach certain levels.

name: Friends
description: For the duration, you have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn’t hostile toward you. When the spell ends, the creature realizes that you used magic to influence its mood and becomes hostile toward you.

name: Frostbite
description: You cause numbing frost to form on one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 1d6 cold damage on a failed save, and it has disadvantage on the next weapon attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn. The spell’s damage increases by 1d6 at higher levels.

name: Green-Flame Blade

components.materials_needed: A melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

description: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects, and green fire leaps to a different creature within 5 feet, dealing extra fire damage at higher levels.

name: Guidance
description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. The spell then ends.

name: Gust
description: You seize the air and compel it to create one of the following effects: push a creature, create a small harmless sensory effect, or move an object. Effects depend on DM discretion and are minor manipulations of the air.

name: Infestation
description: You cause a cloud of mites, fleas, and other parasites to appear momentarily on one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 poison damage and move 5 feet in a random direction if it can move and its speed is at least 5 feet.

name: Light
description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

name: Lightning Lure
description: You create a lash of lightning that strikes at one creature of your choice that you can see within 15 feet. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward you, then take 1d8 lightning damage if it is within 5 feet of you.

name: Mage Hand
description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it. It can manipulate objects, open doors, stow items, or pour contents out of a vial. It cannot attack or activate magical items.

name: Magic Stone
description: You touch one to three pebbles and imbue them with magic. You or someone else can make a ranged spell attack with one of the pebbles by throwing it or hurling it with a sling. On a hit, the target takes bludgeoning damage as if hit by a ranged weapon attack from the pebble. The spell’s damage increases by 1d6 at certain levels.

name: Mending

components.materials_needed: Two lodestones

description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage.

name: Message

components.materials_needed: A short piece of copper wire

description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear.

name: Mind Sliver
description: You drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 1d6 psychic damage and subtract 1d4 from the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn.

name: Minor Illusion
description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range. The illusion ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again. If a creature uses its action to examine the illusion, it can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Investigation check.

name: Mold Earth
description: You choose a portion of dirt or stone that you can see within range that fits within a 5-foot cube. You manipulate it in simple ways: excavate it, move it, cause shapes, colors, or images to appear. Changes last for 1 hour.

name: Poison Spray
description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage. The damage increases at higher levels.

name: Prestidigitation
description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of several minor effects, such as lighting a candle, cleaning or soiling an object, chilling or warming food, or making a small mark or symbol appear.

name: Primal Savagery
description: You channel primal magic to cause your teeth or fingernails to sharpen. Make a melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 acid damage. The damage increases at higher levels.

name: Produce Flame
description: A flickering flame appears in your hand. The flame remains there for the duration and harms neither you nor your equipment. It sheds bright light and can be used to make a ranged spell attack. The damage increases at higher levels.

name: Ray of Frost
description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until your next turn. The damage increases at higher levels.

name: Resistance

components.materials_needed: A miniature cloak

description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. Then the spell ends.

name: Sacred Flame
description: Flame-like radiance descends on one creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw. The damage increases at higher levels.

name: Shape Water
description: You choose an area of water that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube. You can move it, change its color or opacity, or form simple shapes. These changes last for 1 hour.

name: Shillelagh

components.materials_needed: Mistletoe, a shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff

description: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature’s power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for attack and damage rolls, and the weapon’s damage die becomes a d8.

name: Spare the Dying
description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Sword Burst
description: You create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you. Each creature within 5 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take force damage. The damage increases at higher levels.

name: Thorn Whip
description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns. Make a melee spell attack against a creature. On a hit, it takes piercing damage and, if Large or smaller, you can pull it up to 10 feet closer to you. Damage increases at higher levels.

name: Thunderclap
description: You create a burst of thunderous sound that can be heard up to 100 feet away. Each creature other than you within 5 feet must make a Constitution saving throw or take thunder damage. Damage increases at higher levels.

name: Toll the Dead
description: You point at one creature you can see within range, and the sound of a dolorous bell fills the air. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take necrotic damage. If the target is missing any hit points, it takes extra damage. Damage increases at higher levels.

name: True Strike
description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range. Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target’s defenses. On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target.

name: Vicious Mockery
description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range. If it can hear you, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn. Damage increases at higher levels.

name: Word of Radiance
description: You utter a divine word, and burning radiance erupts from you. Each creature of your choice within 5 feet must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take radiant damage. Damage increases at higher levels.

name: Alarm

components.materials_needed: A tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire

description: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or an area within range. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you if a creature enters the area. When you cast the spell, you can designate creatures that won't set off the alarm. When a creature enters the area, you and up to five creatures of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you hear an audible alarm.

name: Animal Friendship

components.materials_needed: A morsel of food

description: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm. Choose a beast that you can see within range. It must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is charmed by you for the duration. If you or your companions do anything harmful to it, the spell ends.

name: Armor of Agathys
description: You surround yourself with a magical force that provides temporary hit points and damages attackers. You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to 5 + your spellcasting ability modifier. If a creature hits you with a melee attack while you have these temporary hit points, the creature takes 5 cold damage.

name: Bless

components.materials_needed: A sprinkling of holy water

description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

name: Burning Hands
description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Charm Person
description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range. It must make a Wisdom saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is charmed by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it. The charmed creature regards you as a friendly acquaintance.

name: Chromatic Orb

components.materials_needed: A diamond worth at least 50 gp

description: You hurl a 1-foot-diameter sphere of energy at a creature within range. Choose the type of energy: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 3d8 damage of the chosen type.

name: Color Spray
description: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is blinded for the duration. Blinded creatures are incapacitated and have a speed of 0. The spell ends for a creature if it takes damage or someone uses an action to shake it out of its stupor.

name: Command
description: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The command must be a single word such as 'approach', 'drop', 'flee', 'grovel', or 'halt'. Some words might be more effective in certain situations.

name: Comprehend Languages
description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear. You also understand any written language you see, but you must be touching the surface on which the words are written.

name: Create or Destroy Water

components.materials_needed: A drop of water or a piece of ice

description: You either create or destroy water within range. Create: You create up to 10 gallons of clean water in an open container or as rain in a 30-foot cube. Destroy: You destroy up to 10 gallons of water in an open container or in a 30-foot cube.

name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Detect Magic
description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any.

name: Detect Poison and Disease

components.materials_needed: A tiny severed snake's head

description: For the duration, you sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you. You also learn whether each creature is diseased or poisoned.

name: Disguise Self
description: You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs.

name: Entangle

components.materials_needed: A small amount of fur or a piece of green plant

description: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain. A creature moving through the area must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained by the entangling plants until the spell ends.

name: False Life

components.materials_needed: A small amount of alcohol or distilled water

description: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain temporary hit points. You gain 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier temporary hit points.

name: Feather Fall
description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can't be knocked prone.

name: Find Familiar

components.materials_needed: 10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier

description: You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: bat, cat, crab, frog (toad), hawk, lizard, octopus, owl, poisonous snake, fish (quipper), rat, raven, seahorse, spider, or weasel. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it always obeys your commands. It rolls its own initiative and acts on its own turn.

name: Grease

components.materials_needed: A bit of pork rind or butter

description: Slick grease covers a 10-foot square within range, making the area difficult terrain. When the grease appears, each creature standing in its area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

name: Healing Word
description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

name: Identify

components.materials_needed: A pearl worth at least 100 gp and an owl feather

description: You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell. If it is a magic item or some other magic-imbued object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn which spell created it.

name: Illusory Script

components.materials_needed: A lead-based ink worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes

description: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a secret message. To outside observers, the writing appears normal, but the target can decipher the hidden message. You choose who can read the hidden message when you cast the spell.

name: Jump
description: You touch a creature. The target's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

name: Longstrider
description: You touch a creature. The target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

name: Purify Food and Drink

components.materials_needed: A sprinkle of holy water

description: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

name: Ray of Sickness
description: A ray of sickening greenish energy lances toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of your next turn.

name: Sanctuary
description: You ward a creature within range against attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker must choose a different target or lose the attack or spell.

name: Shield of Faith

components.materials_needed: A small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it

description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

name: Silent Image
description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon within range that lasts for the duration. The image is purely visual; it isn't accompanied by sound, smell, or other sensory effects.

name: Sleep

components.materials_needed: A pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket

description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is the number of hit points of creatures that can be affected by this spell. Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range are affected in ascending order of their current hit points.

name: Speak with Animals

components.materials_needed: A morsel of food

description: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration. You can’t speak with creatures that are normally incapable of speech.

name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
description: You burst into laughter, which causes one creature of your choice within range that you can see to perceive everything as hilariously funny and fall into fits of laughter if it fails a Wisdom saving throw. A creature in fits of laughter is incapacitated and prone.

name: Tenser's Floating Disk

components.materials_needed: A drop of mercury

description: You create a circular, horizontal plane of force that appears 3 feet above the ground within range. The disk is 3 feet in diameter and 1 inch thick, and it can hold up to 500 pounds. It remains for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action.

name: Thunderwave
description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you.

name: Unseen Servant

components.materials_needed: A piece of string and a bit of wood

description: An invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command. It can move objects, open doors, fetch things, clean, etc., but cannot attack or carry out complex tasks.

name: Witch Bolt

components.materials_needed: A twig from a tree that has been struck by lightning

description: A beam of crackling blue energy lances toward a creature within range, forming a sustained arc of lightning between you and the target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes lightning damage, and the spell continues to deal damage on subsequent turns as long as you maintain concentration.

name: Aid

components.materials_needed: A tiny strip of white cloth

description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration. The spell doesn't stack with itself; casting it again on a target ends the previous spell and raises its hit point maximum by 5 instead of 10.

name: Alter Self
description: You assume a different form. When you cast the spell, choose one of the following options: Aquatic Adaptation, Change Appearance, or Natural Weapons. Each option grants specific benefits, such as the ability to breathe underwater, altering your appearance, or growing natural weapons like claws or fangs.

name: Arcane Lock

components.materials_needed: Gold dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes

description: You touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway. The target is magically locked, and it can't be opened by nonmagical means. You and creatures you designate can open the object normally. You can also set a password that suppresses the spell for 1 minute.

name: Blindness/Deafness
description: You can blind or deafen a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or suffer the chosen condition for the duration. Blindness makes the target unable to see, while deafness makes it unable to hear.

name: Blur
description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it doesn't rely on sight.

name: Branding Smite

components.materials_needed: A flaming weapon or a brand symbol

description: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack before the spell ends, the attack deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage, and the target is illuminated if it is invisible. If the target is undead, it also takes an extra 2d6 necrotic damage.

name: Calm Emotions
description: You attempt to suppress strong emotions in a group of people. Each creature in a 20-foot radius sphere must make a Charisma saving throw or be affected as you choose: either indifferent about creatures of your choice or be unable to attack or target them with harmful spells.

name: Cloud of Daggers

components.materials_needed: A sliver of glass

description: A cube of daggers flashes into existence in a location within range. Each creature that enters the area or starts its turn there must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d4 slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Continual Flame

components.materials_needed: Ruby dust worth at least 50 gp

description: You create a permanent, magical flame on a solid surface. The flame sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. It isn't affected by wind or other environmental factors and doesn't produce heat.

name: Crown of Madness

components.materials_needed: A tiny, straight piece of iron

description: You charm a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for the duration. While charmed, it must use its action to make a melee attack against a creature of your choice. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

name: Darkness

components.materials_needed: Bat fur and a drop of pitch

description: A sphere of magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range. The area is heavily obscured. If the point is on an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it.

name: Darkvision

components.materials_needed: A pinch of dirt, brown ink, and olive oil

description: You touch a willing creature to grant it darkvision out to a range of 60 feet for the duration. If the target already has darkvision, the spell doesn’t increase its range.

name: Detect Thoughts
description: For the duration, you can read the surface thoughts of creatures within 30 feet of you. As an action, you can probe deeper into a creature's mind, attempting to read its thoughts. The target must make a Charisma saving throw.

name: Enhance Ability

components.materials_needed: A feather from a hawk

description: You touch a willing creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement of one ability. Choose one of the following effects: Bear's Endurance, Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendor, Fox's Cunning, or Owl's Wisdom.

name: Enlarge/Reduce

components.materials_needed: A pinch of powdered iron

description: Choose a creature or an object within range. If the target is a creature, its size doubles or halves. If the target is an object, its size changes accordingly. The target also gains advantage or disadvantage on certain checks based on the effect.

name: Enthrall
description: You weave a distracting string of words, causing creatures of your choice within range to become fascinated by you until the spell ends. Affected creatures have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to perceive anything other than you.

name: Find Steed

components.materials_needed: A piece of fodder

description: You summon a spirit that assumes the form of an unusually intelligent, strong, and loyal steed. The steed takes an appearance you choose, such as a warhorse, a pony, a camel, an elk, or a mastiff. Your steed serves you as a mount, and it shares your initiative count.

name: Flaming Sphere

components.materials_needed: A bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron

description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in a location within range. You can move the sphere up to 30 feet on your turn. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw or take fire damage.

name: Gentle Repose

components.materials_needed: A pinch of salt and one copper piece

description: You touch a corpse or other remains. For the duration, the target is protected from decay and cannot become undead. You can also preserve the corpse indefinitely until the spell ends.

name: Gust of Wind

components.materials_needed: A legume seed

description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from you. The gust disperses gas or vapor, and it extinguishes candles, torches, and similar unprotected flames.

name: Heat Metal

components.materials_needed: A piece of iron and a fire source

description: Choose a manufactured metal object within range, such as a metal weapon or armor. You cause the object to glow red-hot. Any creature in physical contact with the object must make a Constitution saving throw or take fire damage and drop the object if it can.

name: Hold Person
description: Choose a humanoid within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At higher levels, you can target more creatures.

name: Invisibility

components.materials_needed: An eyelash encased in gum arabic

description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

name: Knock

components.materials_needed: A small key or piece of iron

description: Choose a door, gate, chest, or other lock within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or be unlocked. If the target is a magical lock, the spell disrupts the magic for 10 minutes.

name: Lesser Restoration

components.materials_needed: A sprinkle of holy water

description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

name: Levitate

components.materials_needed: Either a small leather loop or a piece of fine silver wire

description: One creature or object of your choice within range rises vertically, up to 20 feet, and remains suspended there for the duration. You can move the target up or down as part of your turn.

name: Locate Object

components.materials_needed: A piece of the object you are looking for

description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as it is within 1000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

name: Magic Mouth

components.materials_needed: A small bit of honeycomb and a bit of gum arabic

description: You implant a message within an object in range, such as a door, a keyhole, or a piece of jewelry. When a trigger condition occurs, the spell activates and speaks the message.

name: Magic Weapon

components.materials_needed: A tiny reliquary worth at least 100 gp containing a bit of matter from a weapon

description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Maximilian's Earthen Grasp

components.materials_needed: A lump of clay

description: You cause a hand made from compacted soil to spring up at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration and moves with your commands. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the hand. On a hit, the target is grappled and restrained until the spell ends.

name: Mirror Image

components.materials_needed: Three small glass orbs

description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Each time a creature targets you with an attack, roll a d20 to determine whether the attack instead targets one of your duplicates. A duplicate's AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier. If an attack hits a duplicate, it is destroyed.

name: Misty Step
description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

name: Nystul's Magic Aura

components.materials_needed: A small square of silk

description: You change the way a creature or object appears to magic detection. You can make a nonmagical object appear magical or a magical object appear nonmagical. You can also change the aura to conceal its true school of magic.

name: Phantasmal Force

components.materials_needed: A bit of fleece

description: You create a phantasmal image of a creature, object, or some other visible phenomenon. The phantasm is visible only to the target. It appears real and can interact with the environment. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw; on a failed save, it perceives the phantasm as real and is affected by it.

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
description: A black beam of sickening energy lances toward a creature within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength until the spell ends.

name: Rope Trick

components.materials_needed: A length of rope

description: You touch a length of rope and then hide it on the ground. An invisible, extradimensional space springs into existence above the rope. Up to five creatures can hide in the space. Creatures inside can't be targeted by spells or attacks from outside.

name: Scorching Ray
description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, a target takes fire damage. You can direct the rays at the same target or different ones.

name: See Invisibility
description: For the duration, you can see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible. You also see into the Ethereal Plane.

name: Shatter

components.materials_needed: A chip of mica

description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere must make a Constitution saving throw or take thunder damage and be pushed away from the center.

name: Silence

components.materials_needed: Bat fur and a drop of mercury

description: You create a sphere of silence centered on a point within range. No sound can be created within or pass through the sphere. Creatures inside can't cast spells with verbal components.

name: Spiritual Weapon

components.materials_needed: A weapon worth at least 1 sp

description: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon and repeat the attack.

name: Suggestion

components.materials_needed: A snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil

description: You suggest a course of activity to a creature within range. It must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it pursues the course of action you describe to the best of its ability. The suggestion must be worded in a manner that makes the course of action sound reasonable.

name: Warding Bond

components.materials_needed: A pair of platinum rings worth at least 50 gp each, which you and the target must wear for the duration

description: This spell wards a willing creature you touch and creates a mystic connection between you and the target until the spell ends. While the target is within 60 feet of you, it gains a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws, and it has resistance to all damage. Also, each time it takes damage, you take the same amount of damage.

name: Web

components.materials_needed: A bit of spiderweb

description: You create a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point within range. The webs fill a 20-foot cube. Each creature that starts its turn in the webs must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is restrained by the webs until it breaks free.

name: Animate Dead

components.materials_needed: A drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust

description: This spell creates undead servants from corpses. You can animate a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small humanoid within range. The undead creature is under your control.

name: Beacon of Hope

components.materials_needed: A tiny reliquary worth at least 5 gp containing a bit of holy text

description: This spell bestows hope and vitality. Choose any number of creatures within range. Each target has advantage on Wisdom saving throws and death saving throws, and regains the maximum number of hit points possible from any healing.

name: Bestow Curse

components.materials_needed: A black onyx gemstone worth at least 500 gp

description: You touch a creature and inflict a debilitating curse on it. The curse can impose various effects, such as disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws, disadvantage on attack rolls, or the creature being unable to speak.

name: Blink
description: Roll a d20 at the end of each of your turns for the duration. On a roll of 11 or higher, you vanish from your current plane of existence and appear in the Ethereal Plane until the start of your next turn. During this time, you can't affect or be affected by anything on the material plane.

name: Clairvoyance

components.materials_needed: A focus worth at least 100 gp, such as a jeweled horn or a glass eye

description: You create an invisible sensor within range that allows you to see or hear a specific location. You can choose sight or hearing, and the sensor moves with your chosen mode of perception.

name: Counterspell
description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it's casting a higher-level spell, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability to end the spell.

name: Create Food and Water

components.materials_needed: A morsel of food or a drop of water

description: You create enough food and water to sustain up to six creatures for 24 hours. The food is bland but nourishing, and the water is clean and drinkable.

name: Daylight

components.materials_needed: A bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron

description: A 60-foot radius sphere of bright light spreads from a point you choose within range. The light is bright as daylight and dispels darkness. Undead and creatures sensitive to light have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets in the bright light.

name: Dispel Magic

components.materials_needed: A scrap of matter from a broken object

description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For higher-level spells, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability to end the spell.

name: Fear

components.materials_needed: A white spider silk

description: You project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and become frightened for the duration. Frightened creatures must take the Dash action and move away from you by the safest available route on each of their turns.

name: Fireball

components.materials_needed: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Fly

components.materials_needed: A wing feather from any bird

description: You touch a willing creature and grant it a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration.

name: Gaseous Form

components.materials_needed: A bit of gauze and a wisp of smoke

description: You transform a willing creature you touch into a misty cloud for the duration. The creature can fly at 10 feet and has resistance to nonmagical damage. It can pass through small holes and openings.

name: Haste

components.materials_needed: A shaving of licorice root

description: Choose a willing creature within range. Until the spell ends, the target's speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to AC, has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

name: Hypnotic Pattern

components.materials_needed: A bit of fleece, a bit of smoke, and a small piece of mirage glass

description: You create a twisting pattern of colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube. Each creature in the area who sees the pattern must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed for the duration. While charmed, the creature is incapacitated and has a speed of 0.

name: Leomund's Tiny Hut

components.materials_needed: A small crystal bead

description: A 10-foot-radius immobile dome of force springs into existence around and above you and remains stationary for the duration. The interior is comfortable and dry, regardless of the weather outside. Creatures inside can't see out or be seen from the outside, and creatures outside can't perceive anything inside.

name: Lightning Bolt

components.materials_needed: A bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

description: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Major Image

components.materials_needed: A bit of fleece, a bit of smoke, and a small piece of mirage glass

description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon within range. The image appears at a spot you choose and lasts for the duration. It can make sounds, smells, and thermal effects to make it appear real.

name: Protection from Energy

components.materials_needed: A diamond worth at least 100 gp

description: You touch a creature and protect it from a specific type of energy: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. The target has resistance to that damage type for the duration.

name: Remove Curse

components.materials_needed: A prayer wheel and incense

description: You touch a creature and end either one curse affecting it or all curses affecting it, depending on your choice.

name: Sleet Storm

components.materials_needed: A pinch of dust and a few drops of water

description: A storm of freezing rain and sleet forms in a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range. The area is heavily obscured, and difficult terrain is created. Each creature moving through the area must make a Strength saving throw or fall prone.

name: Slow

components.materials_needed: A drop of molasses

description: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice within range. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target's speed is halved, it takes a penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't use reactions. On each of its turns, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.

name: Stinking Cloud

components.materials_needed: A rotten egg or a piece of meat

description: A 20-foot-radius sphere of yellow, nauseating gas spreads from a point within range. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for the duration. While poisoned in this way, a creature is incapacitated and spends its turn trying to move out of the cloud.

name: Tongues

components.materials_needed: A bit of copper wire

description: You grant a willing creature you touch the ability to understand and be understood in any spoken language. Additionally, the creature can understand any written language it sees.

name: Vampiric Touch

components.materials_needed: A morsel of food that isn't rotten

description: You touch a creature and siphon life force from it. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

name: Water Breathing

components.materials_needed: A pint of fresh water

description: Up to ten willing creatures within range can breathe underwater until the spell ends.

name: Water Walk

components.materials_needed: A drop of water and a piece of wood

description: This spell grants the ability to move across liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground for up to ten willing creatures.

name: Arcane Eye

components.materials_needed: A bit of bat fur and a tiny glass bead

description: You create an invisible, magical eye within range. The eye hovers in the air for the duration, and you can move it up to 30 feet on your turn. You can see through the eye's eyes and hear what it hears.

name: Banishment

components.materials_needed: A tiny box or a similar container

description: You attempt to send a creature you can see within range to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished.

name: Blight

components.materials_needed: A blackened twig

description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 8d8 necrotic damage.

name: Confusion

components.materials_needed: A feather from a bat

description: You create a twisting pattern of shapes and colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube within range. Each creature in the area must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the spell.

name: Conjure Minor Elementals

components.materials_needed: A bit of matter from a creature of the elemental type you plan to summon

description: You summon up to four elementals of challenge rating 2 or lower. They appear in unoccupied spaces within range and act as your allies.

name: Death Ward

components.materials_needed: A tiny silver mirror

description: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death. The first time the target would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, the target instead drops to 1 hit point, and the spell ends.

name: Dimension Door

components.materials_needed: A short piece of string

description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. You can bring along objects up to 500 pounds and up to one willing creature of your size or smaller.

name: Dominate Beast

components.materials_needed: A bit of fur from a beast

description: You attempt to charm a beast that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration. While charmed, you have control over the target.

name: Fabricate

components.materials_needed: A pair of artisan's tools

description: You convert raw materials into products of the same material. Choose raw materials within range and convert them into a finished object of your choice.

name: Fire Shield

components.materials_needed: A bit of brimstone and a small leather loop

description: You create a magical, spectral shield around yourself. Choose either warm shield or chill shield, granting resistance to cold or fire damage, respectively. Additionally, creatures that attack you take damage based on your shield type.

name: Greater Invisibility

components.materials_needed: A pinch of powdered iron

description: You touch a creature and turn it invisible until the spell ends. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

name: Hallucinatory Terrain

components.materials_needed: A piece of land and a bit of soil

description: You make natural terrain in a 150-foot cube look, sound, and smell like some other sort of terrain. This includes creating illusions of structures, such as buildings, roads, or ditches.

name: Locate Creature

components.materials_needed: A bit of fur from a creature that belongs to the target's race

description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the creature's location, as long as it is within 1000 feet of you.

name: Phantasmal Killer

components.materials_needed: A bit of blood from a slain humanoid

description: You create a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fear. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it becomes frightened and takes psychic damage each turn as it tries to escape the fear.

name: Polymorph

components.materials_needed: A caterpillar cocoon

description: You transform a creature that you can see within range into a new form. The transformation lasts for the duration, or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies.

name: Stone Shape

components.materials_needed: A small block of granite

description: You touch a stone object or a stone structure and mold it into any shape that suits your purpose. The object or structure can be no larger than 10 feet in any dimension.

name: Stoneskin

components.materials_needed: A handful of diamond dust

description: You touch a willing creature and turn its flesh as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

name: Wall of Fire

components.materials_needed: A small piece of phosphorus or wychwood, or a stick of lit incense

description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can choose the wall's shape, either a straight line up to 60 feet long or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter. Each creature within 10 feet of the wall must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Animate Objects

components.materials_needed: Tiny objects such as darts or a similar object

description: Objects come to life at your command. You can animate up to ten nonmagical objects that are not being worn or carried. Each object animates and becomes a creature under your control until the spell ends or until reduced to 0 hit points.

name: Bigby's Hand

components.materials_needed: A bit of cured leather

description: You create a Large hand of shimmering force that appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration and can perform various actions, such as pushing creatures, grabbing, restraining, or making attacks.

name: Cloudkill

components.materials_needed: A bit of sulfur

description: You create a cloud of poison gas that moves away from you. The cloud spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. Creatures within the cloud must make Constitution saving throws or take poison damage.

name: Cone of Cold

components.materials_needed: A small crystal or glass bead

description: A blast of cold air erupts from you in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking cold damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

name: Conjure Elemental

components.materials_needed: A drop of water, a piece of earth, a bit of fire, and a pinch of air

description: You summon an elemental of challenge rating 5 or lower. The elemental appears in an unoccupied space within range and acts on your command.

name: Contact Other Plane

components.materials_needed: A reliquary worth at least 1,000 gp containing a bit of the material from a different plane of existence

description: You mentally contact a demigod, the spirit of a long-dead sage, or some other mysterious entity from another plane. You gain knowledge or insight but risk madness if the contact is too overwhelming.

name: Creation

components.materials_needed: A tiny piece of matter of the desired type

description: You create a nonliving object of vegetable matter within range. The object can be of a size and detail appropriate to the spell's description and lasts until dispelled or destroyed.

name: Dispel Evil and Good

components.materials_needed: A tiny piece of fine silver wire

description: You attempt to end an evil or good influence on a creature you can see within range. Depending on the situation, you can also banish extraplanar creatures or protect against certain effects.

name: Dominate Person

components.materials_needed: A small, straight piece of iron

description: You attempt to beguile a humanoid that you can see within range. It must make a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration. While charmed, you have a high degree of control over the target.

name: Geas

components.materials_needed: A bit of mica and jade dust

description: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range. The target must carry out some service or refrain from some action or course of activity as you decide.

name: Greater Restoration

components.materials_needed: A prayer wheel and incense

description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce one condition afflicting the target, such as charmed, petrified, or frightened, or end one effect reducing the target's ability scores.

name: Hold Monster

components.materials_needed: A small crystal or a small piece of jewelry

description: You attempt to paralyze a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

name: Legend Lore

components.materials_needed: A small repository of information, such as a book or scroll

description: You name or describe a person, place, or object. You learn useful knowledge about its history, significance, and lore, including any legends or rumors associated with it.

name: Mass Cure Wounds

components.materials_needed: A holy symbol

description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range. Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points.

name: Modify Memory

components.materials_needed: A small piece of ivory

description: You attempt to reshape another creature's memories. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you can alter its memories for the duration.

name: Passwall

components.materials_needed: A small leather pouch containing sesame seeds

description: You create a passage through wooden, plaster, or stone barriers. The passage is up to 5 feet wide, 8 feet high, and 20 feet long.

name: Raise Dead

components.materials_needed: A diamond worth at least 500 gp

description: You return a dead creature you touch to life, provided that it has been dead no longer than 10 days. The target is restored to its hit point maximum and is under your control for 24 hours.

name: Scrying

components.materials_needed: A focus worth at least 1,000 gp, such as a crystal ball or a silver mirror

description: You create an invisible sensor within range that allows you to see and hear a particular creature you choose. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw, and if successful, it is immune to this spell for 10 days.

name: Seeming

components.materials_needed: A small piece of cloth

description: You change the appearance of any number of creatures that you can see within range. The spell disguises them as creatures of a chosen type, altering their physical features but not their statistics.

name: Telekinesis

components.materials_needed: A small, straight piece of iron

description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. You can lift and move objects, restrain creatures, or even throw them.

name: Teleportation Circle

components.materials_needed: Rare chalks and inks infused with precious gems with a total worth of at least 50 gp, which the spell consumes

description: You create a circle on the ground that links to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice. Creatures can enter the circle to teleport to the linked location.

name: Wall of Force

components.materials_needed: A pinch of powdered iron

description: An invisible wall of force springs into existence at a point you choose within range. The wall is impervious to physical and magical attacks, and creatures cannot pass through it.

name: Wall of Stone

components.materials_needed: A small block of granite

description: You create a wall of solid stone within range. The wall can be shaped as you like and can range in length, height, and thickness. Creatures cannot pass through it unless they break it.

name: Arcane Gate
description: You create linked portals at two locations you can see. One portal appears within range, and the second portal appears at a location within 500 feet of the first portal. A circular portal, 10 feet in diameter, opens at each point. The portals are two-dimensional glowing rings filled with mist. Any creature or object entering a portal exits from the other as if the two were adjacent to each other. Passing through a portal from one side costs no extra movement.

name: Blade Barrier

components.materials_needed: A small dagger

description: You create a vertical wall of whirling, razor-sharp blades made of magical energy. The wall appears within range and lasts for the duration. You can make the wall up to 100 feet long, 20 feet high, and 5 feet thick. Any creature that enters the wall's area for the first time or starts its turn there must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 6d10 slashing damage.

name: Chain Lightning

components.materials_needed: A bit of fur, a piece of amber, glass, or a crystal rod

description: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can only be targeted by one of the bolts. A creature must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 10d8 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Disintegrate

components.materials_needed: A lodestone and a pinch of dust

description: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger to a target that you can see within range. The target can be a creature, an object, or a creation of magical force. A creature targeted by this spell must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 10d6 + 40 force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, it is disintegrated. Objects and magical effects are also affected as described in the spell.

name: Find the Path

components.materials_needed: A set of divination tools—such as bones, ivory sticks, or similar items—worth at least 100 gp

description: This spell allows you to find the shortest, most direct physical route to a specific fixed location that you are familiar with on the same plane of existence. If you name a destination on another plane of existence, a general sense of direction is given but the spell fails to guide you to the location. You must choose a destination that you have visited or seen before.

name: Flesh to Stone

components.materials_needed: A pinch of lime, water, and earth

description: You attempt to turn one creature that you can see within range into stone. If the target's body is made of flesh, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is restrained as its flesh begins to harden. On a successful save, the creature is unaffected. If the creature is restrained for the duration, it is turned to stone and subjected to the petrified condition for the duration or until a greater restoration spell is cast on it.

name: Globe of Invulnerability

components.materials_needed: A glass or crystal bead that shatters when the spell ends

description: An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot radius around you and remains for the duration. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher-level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them.

name: Harm
description: You unleash a virulent disease on a creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 14d6 necrotic damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. The damage can't reduce the target's hit points below 1. If the target fails the saving throw, its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage it took. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

name: Heal
description: Choose a creature that you can see within range. A surge of positive energy washes through the creature, causing it to regain 70 hit points. This spell also ends blindness, deafness, and any diseases affecting the target. This spell has no effect on constructs or undead.

name: Heroes' Feast

components.materials_needed: A gem-encrusted bowl worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes

description: You bring forth a great feast, including magnificent food and drink. The feast takes 1 hour to consume and disappears at the end of that time, and the beneficial effects don't set in until this hour is over. Up to twelve creatures can partake of the feast. A creature that partakes of the feast gains several benefits: it is cured of all diseases and poison, becomes immune to poison and being frightened, makes all Wisdom saving throws with advantage, and its hit point maximum increases by 2d10. These benefits last for 24 hours.

name: Magic Jar

components.materials_needed: A gem, crystal, reliquary, or some other ornamental container worth at least 500 gp

description: Your body falls into a catatonic state as your soul leaves it and enters the container you used for the spell's material component. While your soul inhabits the container, you are aware of your surroundings as if you were in the container's space. You can't move or use reactions. The only action you can take is to project your soul up to 100 feet out of the container, either returning to your living body (and ending the spell) or attempting to possess a humanoid's body.

name: Mass Suggestion

components.materials_needed: A snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil

description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune to this effect. The suggestion must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable. Asking the creature to stab itself, throw itself onto a spear, immolate itself, or do some other obviously harmful act ends the spell.

name: Move Earth

components.materials_needed: An iron blade and a small bag containing a mixture of soils—clay, loam, and sand

description: You choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range that you can see and that is on the ground. You can reshape dirt, sand, or clay in the area in any manner you choose for the duration. You can raise or lower the area's elevation, create or fill in a trench, erect or flatten a wall, or form a pillar. The extent of any such changes can't exceed half the area's largest dimension. For example, if you affect a 40-foot square, you can create a pillar up to 20 feet high.

name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere

components.materials_needed: A small crystal sphere

description: A frigid globe of cold energy streaks from your fingertips to a point of your choice within range, where it explodes in a 60-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10d6 cold damage. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage. If the globe strikes a body of water or a liquid that is principally water (not including water-based creatures), it freezes the liquid to a depth of 6 inches over an area 30 feet square. This freeze lasts for 1 minute.

name: Sunbeam

components.materials_needed: A magnifying glass

description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 6d8 radiant damage and is blinded until your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't blinded. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on this saving throw.

name: True Seeing

components.materials_needed: An ointment for the eyes that costs 25 gp, is made from mushroom powder, saffron, and fat, and is consumed by the spell

description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are. For the duration, the creature has truesight, notices secret doors hidden by magic, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, all out to a range of 120 feet.

name: Wall of Ice

components.materials_needed: A small piece of quartz

description: You create a wall of ice on a solid surface within range. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a sphere with a radius of up to 10 feet, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 10-foot-square panels. Each panel must be contiguous with another panel. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (your choice which side).

name: Word of Recall
description: You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary. You and any creatures that teleport with you appear in the nearest unoccupied space to the spot you designated when you prepared your sanctuary (see below). If you cast this spell without first preparing a sanctuary, the spell has no effect.

name: Delayed Blast Fireball

components.materials_needed: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

description: A beam of yellow light flashes from your pointing finger, then condenses to linger at a chosen point within range as a glowing bead for the duration. When the spell ends, either because your concentration is broken or because you decide to end it, the bead blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame that spreads around corners. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw.

name: Etherealness
description: You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, in the area where it overlaps with your current plane. You remain in the Ethereal Plane for the duration or until you use your action to dismiss the spell. During this time, you can move in any direction. If you move up or down, every foot of movement costs an extra foot.

name: Finger of Death
description: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain. The target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 7d8 + 30 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A humanoid killed by this spell rises at the start of your next turn as a zombie that is permanently under your command.

name: Plane Shift

components.materials_needed: A forked, metal rod worth at least 250 gp, attuned to a particular plane of existence

description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination.

name: Prismatic Spray
description: Eight multicolored rays of light flash from your hand. Each ray is a different color and has a different power and purpose. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. For each target, roll a d8 to determine which color ray affects it.

name: Antimagic Field

components.materials_needed: A pinch of powdered iron or iron filings

description: A 10-foot-radius invisible sphere of antimagic surrounds you. This area is divorced from the magical energy that suffuses the multiverse. Within the sphere, spells can’t be cast, summoned creatures disappear, and even magic items become mundane.

name: Control Weather

components.materials_needed: Burning incense and bits of earth and wood mixed in water

description: You take control of the weather within 5 miles of you for the duration. You must be outdoors to cast this spell. Moving to a place where you don’t have a clear path to the sky ends the spell early. When you cast the spell, you change the current weather conditions, which are determined by the DM based on the climate and season.

name: Earthquake

components.materials_needed: A pinch of dirt, a piece of rock, and a lump of clay

description: You create a seismic disturbance at a point on the ground that you can see within range. For the duration, an intense tremor rips through the ground in a 100-foot-radius circle centered on that point and shakes creatures and structures in contact with the ground in that area.

name: Feeblemind

components.materials_needed: A handful of clay, crystal, glass, or mineral spheres

description: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range, attempting to shatter its intellect and personality. The target takes 4d6 psychic damage and must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's Intelligence and Charisma scores become 1. The creature can’t cast spells, activate magic items, understand language, or communicate in any intelligible way.

name: Sunburst

components.materials_needed: Fire and a piece of sunstone

description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range. Each creature in that light must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 12d6 radiant damage and is blinded for 1 minute. On a successful save, it takes half damage and isn't blinded.

name: Foresight
description: You touch a willing creature and bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future. For the duration, the target can’t be surprised and has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. Additionally, other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target for the duration.

name: Meteor Swarm

components.materials_needed: A pinch of sulfur

description: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 20d6 fire damage and 20d6 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Power Word Kill
description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to die instantly. If the creature you choose has 100 hit points or fewer, it dies. Otherwise, the spell has no effect.

name: True Polymorph

components.materials_needed: A drop of mercury, a dollop of gum arabic, and a wisp of smoke

description: You transform a creature or object that you can see within range into a new form. If you concentrate on this spell for the full duration, the transformation becomes permanent.

name: Wish
description: Wish is the mightiest spell a mortal creature can cast. By simply speaking aloud, you can alter the very foundations of reality in accord with your desires. The basic use of this spell is to duplicate any other spell of 8th level or lower. Alternatively, you can create one of the following effects of your choice...
